review: I am pretty happy with the player - I am taking a start off - because I think (my opinion here) it should be a more open Android box - it's great that it's working excellent with Amazon Prime (YEAH BUFFERING), great that they have ported many Android games to the device to work better w/ your HDTV - BUT it should be as open and have as many selections available as an Android phone and tablets do.  IF I wanted single source apps and a highly polished user interface - idiot proof operations - I would have bought an Apple device.  I know I can root it and get there - and I am side loading apps (XBMC Showbox) - but it shouldn't have to be an effort!
author: Stuart Klaus

review: I got this to try prime.  I did not see anything I would like to keep prime, but this is a great device to watch the shows I have bought from Amazon.  It is good to have even if you do not have Prime membership.
